name: Minesweeper (open source + cross platform)
description:
Miss the good old Minesweeper for windows 98 ? I know you do.

Here is an open-source modern remake for it for all platforms although I will just put binaries for windows you can build other version yourself (or ask me to if you are interested).

It has all the functions from orignal gameplay to all options and experience that the windows 98 version has but with a modern UI.
